T02D2519:70b-2: gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D2519:70b-3: nutta ra kle sha tstshe da sarba dharmma sa manta
T02D2519:70b-4: dzny'a na mah'a pra dzny'a p'a ra mi ta p'u
T02D2519:70b-5: dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa
T02D2519:70b-6: ma ye h'um / lus kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
T02D2519:70b-7: phyir bdag nyid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma

T02D2519:70b-17: pas lhag par mos par byas la 'di skad ces

T02D2519:70b-21: ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2519:70b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig
T02D2519:70b-23: pa'i sbyor bas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la
T02D2519:70b-24: lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D2519:70b-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta
T02D2519:70b-26: na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra
T02D2519:70b-28: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2519:70b-31: smon pa med pa'i rnam pas lhag par mos par byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:70b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya p'u dzam
T02D2519:70b-33: ghe sa mu dra spha na na sa ma ye
T02D2519:70b-34: h'um / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2519:70b-35: yang dag par mchod nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o

T02D2519:70b-42: dge ba'i rtsa 'di bdag dang sems can thams cad
T02D2519:70b-43: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa
T02D2519:70b-44: thams cad bral bar gyur cig 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2519:70b-45: rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
T02D2519:71a-0: dang yang dag par ldan pa'i @71a * //
T02D2519:71a-2: yid bde ba nyid kyis mi'i mchog sangs rgyas nyid
T02D2519:71a-3: du tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig / bdag ni
T02D2519:71a-4: dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02D2519:71a-5: 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02D2519:71a-6: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol //
T02D2519:71a-7: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la /
T02D2519:71a-9: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2519:71a-10: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D2519:71a-11: byang chub sems ni bla med pas //
T02D2519:71a-12: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-13: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D2519:71a-14: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2519:71a-15: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2519:71a-16: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2519:71a-17: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-18: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2519:71a-19: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2519:71a-20: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-21: nam du yang ni mi spang ngo //
T02D2519:71a-22: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2519:71a-23: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2519:71a-24: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-25: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-26: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D2519:71a-27: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2519:71a-28: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D2519:71a-29: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D2519:71a-30: byang chub chen po las byung ba //

T02D2519:71a-32: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D2519:71a-33: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //

T02D2519:71a-35: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2519:71a-36: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-37: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-38: byang chub sems ni bla med pas //
T02D2519:71a-39: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02D2519:71a-40: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2519:71a-41: bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D2519:71a-42: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-43: ma rgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2519:71a-44: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D2519:71a-45: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2519:71a-47: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2519:71a-48: lha mo rnams kyi sku bdag nyid la gzugs brnyan
T02D2519:71a-49: du snang bas rgyal po'i bka' ltar 'da' bar dka'
T02D2519:71b-0: zhing gzhig mi nus @71b pas phyag rgya bcing ba
T02D2519:71b-1: dang / sngags brjod pa thams cad la rgyal ba
T02D2519:71b-2: thams cad kyis kyang rdo rje ltar 'da' bar mi

T02D2519:71b-5: de la phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin te thal mo sbyar bar byed pa na /
T02D2519:71b-7: aa nyo nya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: sor mo phan tshun bcer ba na /
T02D2519:71b-8: sphar sphar aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a: badzra aanydza li /
T02D2519:71b-9: rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02D2519:71b-10: aa tyan ta aa nu pra bishti sarba dharma badzra bandha /
T02D2519:71b-11: zhes bya ba 'dis lha rnams reg pa dang /
T02D2519:71b-12: phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa dang /

T02D2519:71b-15: par bya'o // de nas badzra bandha trat zhes zlos

T02D2519:71b-17: par bya'o // // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2519:71b-18: kyang bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i phyir khros par gyur cig
T02D2519:71b-19: par bya'o // // / h'um takki spho ta ya
T02D2519:71b-20: ma h'a b'ir ga tsakram badzra dha ra sadya na
T02D2519:71b-21: th'a zhes bya bas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D2519:71b-23: rdo rje bsdams las mthe bod dang //
T02D2519:71b-24: mthe'u chung gnyis ni snyoms te bsgreng //
T02D2519:71b-25: dbus ma gsum bsgreng kha phye la //
T02D2519:71b-27: de nas lnga po bsdus pa bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2519:71b-28: aom ma h'a su kha badzra saddh'a ya sarba satva
T02D2519:71b-29: bhyo dza: h'um pham ho: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings
T02D2519:71b-30: nas su // mdzub mo mthe bo'i skye gnas su //
T02D2519:71b-31: g-yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma ni //
T02D2519:71b-32: bcug la bskyod de bcir bar bya //
T02D2519:71b-33: zhes bya ba 'di ni lnga po bsdus pa'o //
T02D2519:71b-34: aom badzra a'a be sha zhes bya bas rdo rje
T02D2519:71b-35: dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la aa zhes bya bas
T02D2519:71b-36: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //

T02D2519:71b-38: dbab pa de yang 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2519:71b-39: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02D2519:71b-40: hri da ya me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddham me
T02D2519:71b-41: pra ya tstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre
T02D2519:71b-42: ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: //

T02D2519:71b-44: aom badzra mushti bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2519:71b-45: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis kyi bar du

T02D2519:72a-0: btsir ba ni rdo rje khu @72a * //

T02D2519:72a-5: de'i sngags lan gsum brjod cing aom badzra mu: zhes pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //

T02D2519:72a-7: rdo rje la yi ge h'um yid kyis mngon par

T02D2519:72a-11: dkyil 'khor de'i steng du de nyid las zla ba'i
T02D2519:72a-13: yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba las /

T02D2519:72a-22: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa' bsnyems pa dang

T02D2519:72a-24: brjod par bya'o // yang yi ge h'um zlos shing

T02D2519:72a-36: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //

T02D2519:72a-41: zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms par bya'o //
T02D2519:72a-42: de nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das khro bo

T02D2519:72b-6: grihn'a pa ya grihna'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2519:72b-8: bha ga b'ana badzra h'um phat /

T02D2519:72b-12: dgug cing bcug la bcing pa dang //
T02D2519:72b-13: dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya //

T02D2519:72b-16: de nyid dang sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes brjod de /
T02D2519:72b-17: der bdag nyid dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2519:72b-18: g-yon brkyang ba yis legs par bzhugs //

T02D2519:72b-22: g-yas pa yis ni au ma yi //

T02D2519:72b-38: dbang bskur dang ldan sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2519:72b-39: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa'o //

T02D2519:72b-42: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje h'um dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2519:72b-43: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2519:72b-44: phyag rgya chen po yang ji lta ba bzhin du bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2519:72b-45: de'i rjes la bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /

T02D2519:73a-23: de nas badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba de bzhin
T02D2519:73a-24: gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags la bsam par bya'o

T02D2519:73a-27: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2519:73a-28: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2519:73a-29: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02D2519:73a-30: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2519:73a-32: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2519:73a-33: g-yas pa'i so mor brkyang bas sa la reg pa'i tshul du bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
T02D2519:73a-34: 'di nyid lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02D2519:73a-35: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa gnyis kyi
T02D2519:73a-36: sor mo brkyang la lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du
T02D2519:73a-37: pang bar bzhag pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mchog
T02D2519:73a-38: ces bya ste / 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
T02D2519:73b-0: mi bskyod @73b pa'i phyag rgya las lag pa g-yas
T02D2519:73b-1: pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du byas nas bzhag pa
T02D2519:73b-3: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2519:73b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //

T02D2519:74a-2: gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste //

T02D2519:74b-4: deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya //

T02D2519:74b-10: aom badzra kro dha tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /

T02D2519:76b-8: de'i don gsum bsgoms la khams gsum rnam bar rgyal
T02D2519:76b-9: ba'i dkyil 'khor ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal
T02D2519:76b-10: bskyed par bya'o // de nas de bzhin du sngags zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2519:76b-11: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra
T02D2519:76b-12: mngon par sgrogs par mdzad par lhag par bsam par
T02D2519:76b-13: bya ste / de lta bus ni bzlas pa thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:76b-14: de nas bzlas pa'i don ni aom zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2519:76b-15: sumbha zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D2519:76b-16: ni sumbha ni zhes bya ba ni de rnams rjes su thul cig pa'o //
T02D2519:76b-17: h'um zhes pa ni des sod cig pa'o //
T02D2519:76b-18: phat ces bya ba ni ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba 'pho bar bya'o //
T02D2519:76b-19: lhag ma ni go bar zad do //
T02D2519:76b-20: h'um bzhi pa ni lan bzhi brjod par ston pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2519:76b-21: de yang aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2519:76b-22: sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su thul cig ces gsungs pa'o //
T02D2519:76b-24: bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang
T02D2519:76b-25: 'dul bar mdzad na lha la sogs pa lta smos
T02D2519:76b-26: kyang ci dgos / 'dul ba'i sdug bsngal 'jig pa ste //
T02D2519:76b-27: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gcod pa yin //
T02D2519:76b-28: h'um zhes bya ba gsod pa'i mchog / gdug pa skrag pa gsod pa yin //
T02D2519:76b-30: nyon mongs gdug pa ltung byed cing //
T02D2519:76b-31: zhi bas 'gugs pa yin par bshad //
T02D2519:76b-32: phat ces bya ba ltung ba'i sgra //
T02D2519:76b-34: yang na ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2519:76b-35: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02D2519:76b-36: rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa'am /
T02D2519:76b-37: rnal 'byor gcig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2519:76b-38: blos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02D2519:77a-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yi ge aa 'i don bsgom pas /
T02D2519:77a-2: nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsams la /
T02D2519:77a-3: nam mkha'i phyogs der yi ge yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2519:77a-4: de'i steng du yi ge bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2519:77a-5: de'i steng du yi ge lam las gser gyi dkyil 'khor ;
T02D2519:77a-6: de'i steng du yi ge bam las rgya mtsho chen po //
T02D2519:77a-7: chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor der //
T02D2519:77a-8: h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po
T02D2519:77a-9: ri rab zur bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i
T02D2519:77a-10: rang bzhin can / rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par bsams la /
T02D2519:77a-11: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2519:77a-13: zhes zlos shing rdo rje bsdams pas gzhi la reg
T02D2519:77a-14: pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par
T02D2519:77a-15: bya'o // de nas sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'khor los gzhal yas khang sprul la /
T02D2519:77a-16: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D2519:77a-17: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sim zhes
T02D2519:77a-18: bya ba las seng ge'i gdan mi bskyod pa'i gnas
T02D2519:77a-19: su h'um gam h'um zhes bya ba las glang po
T02D2519:77a-20: che'i gdan / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su tr'a bam tr'a zhes bya ba las rta'i gdan /
T02D2519:77a-21: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su hr'i: mam hr'i: zhes bya ba rma bya'i gdan /
T02D2519:77a-22: don yod grub pa'i gnas su aa:mam a'a:zhes bya ba
T02D2519:77a-23: las nam mkha' lding gi gdan la aa las byung
T02D2519:77a-24: ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa rnam par
T02D2519:77a-25: bsams nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug
T02D2519:77a-26: la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang /
T02D2519:77a-28: theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba'i chos dang /
T02D2519:77a-29: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas yang dag
T02D2519:77a-30: par bsdus pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o
T02D2519:77a-31: // de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gro
T02D2519:77a-32: ba thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D2519:77a-33: la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang
T02D2519:77a-34: // / ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsdus pa thams cad la snying rje ba dang /
T02D2519:77a-35: 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang /
T02D2519:77a-36: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yang btang snyoms su bya ba dang /
T02D2519:77a-37: chos thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2519:77a-38: sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang /
T02D2519:77b-0: @77b mi g-yor du mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par bya ba dang /
T02D2519:77b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2519:77b-3: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02D2519:77b-6: dril bu dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D2519:77b-10: zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa mngon du bya ba dang /
T02D2519:77b-11: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams dang bcas pa'i
T02D2519:77b-12: chos thams cad kyi tshul thams cad ston pa dang
T02D2519:77b-14: sdom pa thams cad nan tan du byas shing cho gas yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2519:77b-15: sems can rnams bskyab pa dang /
T02D2519:77b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya
T02D2519:77b-17: ba yang mngon du byas nas bdag nyid cod pan
T02D2519:77b-18: gyi dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2519:77b-19: chen po don thams cad grub par lhag par mos
T02D2519:77b-20: pas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa mngon
T02D2519:77b-21: du byas nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas yongs
T02D2519:77b-22: su bskor te / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2519:77b-23: nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang
T02D2519:77b-24: pa ba rtsegs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2519:77b-25: cad kyi bsod nams las nges par 'byung ba'i seng
T02D2519:77b-26: ge'i gdan la zhal thams cad pas bzhugs par bsams
T02D2519:77b-27: la / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas bdag
T02D2519:77b-28: nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub mchog gi phyag
T02D2519:77b-29: la / rgya bcings te / badzra sa tva zhes
T02D2519:77b-30: zlos shing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi snying
T02D2519:77b-31: ga nas phyung la lha thams cad kyi gnas su
T02D2519:77b-32: ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bzhag nas
T02D2519:77b-33: la / rgya bcings te / / rdo rje sems
T02D2519:77b-34: dpa' nyid bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i par du byas
T02D2519:77b-35: nas ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod par
T02D2519:77b-36: la / rgya bcings te / / bya'o // 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2519:77b-37: grub pa'i rdo rje bla na med //
T02D2519:77b-38: bdag de bdag gi lag tu byin //
T02D2519:77b-39: rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas ;
T02D2519:77b-40: / dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin no //
T02D2519:77b-41: de nas de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2519:77b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che //
T02D2519:77b-43: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2519:77b-44: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //
T02D2519:78a-0: ces bya ba'i bar gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad @78a * //
T02D2519:78a-1: pas bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2519:78a-2: de nas rdo rje bdag nyid kyi snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D2519:78a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2519:78a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal to //
T02D2519:78a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D2519:78a-6: ci'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa /
T02D2519:78a-7: bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te /
T02D2519:78a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa khyed rnams kyis kyang zhi bas
T02D2519:78a-9: 'dul bar mi spyod pa de dag la bdag gis
T02D2519:78a-11: de nas bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2519:78a-12: mdzad dang tha mi dad pa lhag par mos par
T02D2519:78a-13: byas la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi snying gar zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2519:78a-14: de nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas
T02D2519:78a-15: h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul bar
T02D2519:78a-16: bya'o // de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i
T02D2519:78a-17: rdo rje la kun du 'bar ba'i snying po khro
T02D2519:78a-18: gnyer can smin ma btsums shing dpral ba gnyer ba
T02D2519:78a-19: bya'o // / mche ba lhag ge phyung zhing so gtsigs pa /
T02D2519:78a-20: rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang /
T02D2519:78a-22: zhags pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i me lce 'bar
T02D2519:78a-23: ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa rnam pa du
T02D2519:78a-25: rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs 'dzin pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas sku las byung ste /
T02D2519:78a-26: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar byas nas /
T02D2519:78a-27: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun
T02D2519:78a-28: du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
T02D2519:78a-29: du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du
T02D2519:78a-30: brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02D2519:78a-31: kye ma thams cad 'dul ba yis //
T02D2519:78a-32: thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te //
T02D2519:78a-33: gang phyir sems can gdul thabs phyir //
T02D2519:78a-34: dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur//
T02D2519:78a-35: yang bdag nyid bcom ldan das rnams par snang mdzad dang tha mi dad par lhag par mos la /
T02D2519:78a-36: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2519:78a-38: grihna grihna h'um grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um a'a na ya ho /
T02D2519:78a-39: bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02D2519:78b-0: ces zlos shing de bzhin gshegs @78b pa thams cad
T02D2519:78b-1: kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs su
T02D2519:78b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams
T02D2519:78b-4: cad na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2519:78b-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis
T02D2519:78b-6: byin gyis brlabs te spyan drangs nas /
T02D2519:78b-7: rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste /
T02D2519:78b-8: dam tshig bcings nas yang gcig tu 'dus te /
T02D2519:78b-9: rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su gyur nas
T02D2519:78b-10: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar
T02D2519:78b-11: 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
T02D2519:78b-12: do // ae ma'i byang chub sems 'di ni //
T02D2519:78b-13: kun du gzung zhing sdig med de //
T02D2519:78b-14: gang phyir sems can 'dul don du //
T02D2519:78b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
T02D2519:78b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla
T02D2519:78b-18: ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te bka' nod cing 'dug
T02D2519:78b-19: go // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2519:78b-20: cad bdag ni khro bo'i dbang du bgyis la tshar
T02D2519:78b-21: gcad par 'os pa rnams tshar bcad par bgyi na
T02D2519:78b-22: go // / bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar 'grub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol /
T02D2519:78b-23: de nas h'um takki dza: zhes bya ba'i rnam par
T02D2519:78b-24: snang mdzad kyi bkas khro bo'i 'khor lo thams cad
T02D2519:78b-25: kyang rang gi snying gnas phyung ste /
T02D2519:78b-26: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag la /
T02D2519:78b-27: h'um takki dza: zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang
T02D2519:78b-28: ldan pas lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten
T02D2519:78b-29: gsum po thams cad dgug par bya'o //
T02D2519:78b-31: mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyur bcing //
T02D2519:78b-32: rdo rje gnyis ka bla 'og tu //
T02D2519:78b-33: dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'dis //
T02D2519:78b-34: skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs //
T02D2519:78b-35: aom ni sumbha badzra h'um phat /
T02D2519:78b-36: ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bcings la /
T02D2519:78b-37: h'um zhes bya bas thams cad kun du brgyal zhing
T02D2519:78b-38: kha spub tu 'gyel la lha chen po ni shi
T02D2519:78b-40: lha chen po grags pa khyab 'jug la sogs pa ni /
T02D2519:78b-41: aom badzro tishtha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas
T02D2519:78b-42: pas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la bzhag ste
T02D2519:78b-43: blang ngo / rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis legs par //
T02D2519:79a-2: shi ba thams cad slong ba ste //
T02D2519:79a-3: rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2519:79a-4: gsos na 'di yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:79a-5: zhes bya ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi bkas badzra
T02D2519:79a-6: a'a yu zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas
T02D2519:79a-7: lha chen po gso bar bya'o //
T02D2519:79a-8: rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis legs par //
T02D2519:79a-9: rdo rje bcing pa bcings nas su //
T02D2519:79a-10: bsgyur te gtsug tu gzhag pa ni //
T02D2519:79a-12: aom p'a da a'a karsha na badzra h'um zhes bya
T02D2519:79a-13: bas rkang pa'i mthil nas khro bo rkang pas 'gugs
T02D2519:79a-14: pa'i kun du 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po'i khro
T02D2519:79a-15: gnyer byas pas mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D2519:79a-16: gdon chen po phyung nas bka' nod cing 'dug par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2519:79a-17: aom p'a da a'a karsha ya sarba badzra dha ra
T02D2519:79a-18: aa nu ra tsa kaddha badzra h'um dza: zhes bya
T02D2519:79a-19: ba 'di phyag rgya dang bcas pas lha chen po
T02D2519:79a-20: chung ma dang bcas pa bkug ste sngags pa'i rang
T02D2519:79a-21: gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag go //
T02D2519:79a-22: rdo rje bcings ba dam byas te //
T02D2519:79a-23: mthe bo snyoms pa'i nang du gzhug / mdzub mo dang bor bkug nas su //
T02D2519:79a-24: gcus pa zhabs su bkug pa'o //
T02D2519:79a-25: aom badzra ma h'a kro dha zhes zlos shing khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2519:79a-26: rkang pa g-yon pas lha chen po mnan la /
T02D2519:79a-27: g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma'i bar steng nas btsir ba /
T02D2519:79a-28: aom badzra a'a be sha ha na pa ta ta
T02D2519:79a-29: ta zhes bya ba lha chen po 'bab pa'i phyag
T02D2519:79a-30: rgya dang bcas bas dbab par bya'o //
T02D2519:79a-31: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02D2519:79a-32: gcig la gcig ni gdab pa ni //
T02D2519:79a-33: sems can gang gi lus la yang //
T02D2519:79a-34: babs nas de yang rdob par byed //
T02D2519:79a-35: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham /
T02D2519:79a-36: zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pas babs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o //
T02D2519:79a-37: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02D2519:79a-38: bdag gam pha rol go char bya //
T02D2519:79a-39: mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas nas //
T02D2519:79a-40: rtag pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur //
T02D2519:79a-41: de nas lha chen po'i lus las ched du brjod pa 'byung bar mos par bya'o //
T02D2519:79a-42: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2519:79a-43: sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med //
T02D2519:79a-44: yi ge'i tshig gis mnan nas su //
T02D2519:79a-45: mya ngan las ni 'das par gzhag / yang thams cad gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2519:79a-47: dam tshig dang sdom pa dang /
T02D2519:79b-0: byang @79b chub kyi sems nyid bkod nas /
T02D2519:79b-1: 'jug pa'i dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas nas 'dis 'ching du gzhug go //
T02D2519:79b-2: aom badzra sa ma ya grihna batdha sa ma ya
T02D2519:79b-3: ma nu sma ra sarba ta th'a ga ta sa
T02D2519:79b-4: ma ya stvam / dri dho me bha ba aa
T02D2519:79b-5: htya ro me bha ba aa pra ti ha ryo
T02D2519:79b-6: ma ya stvam / me bha ba / sarba karma
T02D2519:79b-7: su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya:ku ru ha ha
T02D2519:79b-8: ha ha ho: de bzhin du 'dis khro bo tir'inti
T02D2519:79b-10: lag pa gnyis su dbab par bya'o //
T02D2519:79b-11: aom sa ma ya bra be sha mi /
T02D2519:79b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan te /
T02D2519:79b-13: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba 'di'i
T02D2519:79b-14: 'og nas bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam
T02D2519:79b-15: tshig gi phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po
T02D2519:79b-16: la sogs pa la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2519:79b-17: de nas 'dis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la
T02D2519:79b-18: sogs pas rdo rje'i mtshan ma lag tu sbyin no
T02D2519:79b-19: // aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2519:79b-20: ta badzra dha ra tre badzra p'a ni hi ha
T02D2519:79b-21: // ha ha ha / de'i rjes la ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2519:79b-22: de nas ming rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02D2519:79b-23: 'di lta ste dbang phyug chen po ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i khro bo'o //
T02D2519:79b-24: khyab 'jug ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu ma'o //
T02D2519:79b-25: gzhon nu k'a rti ka ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i dril bu'o //
T02D2519:79b-26: tshangs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i thub pa'o //
T02D2519:79b-27: dbang po ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan cha zhes bya'o //

T02D2519:86a-33: kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtag par byas

T02D2519:86b-1: mchod yon la mchod yon gyi phyag rgya dang /

T02D2519:86b-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung
T02D2519:86b-9: ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi lcug ma las
T02D2519:86b-10: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
T02D2519:86b-11: me tog gis sil mar gtor nas spos kyang gtul

T02D2519:86b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi zhag ni thun gsum du bzla'o //
T02D2519:86b-16: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2519:86b-17: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2519:86b-18: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2519:86b-21: m'a ma k'i la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i rdzas las brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2519:86b-22: lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //

T02D2519:86b-24: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang /
T02D2519:86b-25: me tog la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas mchod yon phul la /
T02D2519:86b-26: slob ma lhag par gas par bya'o //
T02D2519:86b-27: de la re zhig dang por legs par khrus byas la /
T02D2519:86b-28: gos gtsang ma bgos shing lag par me tog thogs pa'i slob mas /
T02D2519:86b-29: slob dpon la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02D2519:86b-30: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2519:86b-31: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2519:86b-32: byang chub chen pos tshul brtan pa //
T02D2519:86b-33: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //

T02D2519:86b-35: byang chub sems kyang stsal du gsol //
T02D2519:86b-36: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2519:86b-37: skyabs gsum dag kyang stsal du gsol //
T02D2519:86b-38: thar pa chen pos grong mchog tu //
T02D2519:86b-39: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi //
T02D2519:87a-1: dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar h'um las rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2519:87a-2: khu tshur g-yas pas rdo rje bzung ste /
T02D2519:87a-3: snying po de'i snying gar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2519:87a-4: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra
T02D2519:87a-5: ya th'a su kha zhes bya ba brjod nas de
T02D2519:87a-6: nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du
T02D2519:87a-8: rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02D2519:87a-9: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas gson //
T02D2519:87a-10: brjod pas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02D2519:87a-11: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02D2519:87a-12: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2519:87a-13: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //

T02D2519:87a-15: spyan sngar ma lus so sor bshags par bgyi //
T02D2519:87a-16: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang //
T02D2519:87a-17: rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
T02D2519:87a-18: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan pa la'ang /
T02D2519:87a-19: rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2519:87a-20: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing //
T02D2519:87a-21: blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02D2519:87a-22: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2519:87a-23: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2519:87a-24: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
T02D2519:87a-25: dman pa'i 'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02D2519:87a-26: srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2519:87a-27: 'dod chags la sogs sprul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02D2519:87a-28: blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i //
T02D2519:87a-29: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2519:87a-30: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2519:87a-31: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02D2519:87a-32: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa //
T02D2519:87a-33: snying rje'i rtsa pa zug cing yang dag rtogs //
T02D2519:87a-34: mnyam med byang chub rnam gsum gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:87a-35: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //

T02D2519:87a-37: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2519:87a-38: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du btang //
T02D2519:87a-39: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2519:87b-0: bsam gtan shes rab bla na @87b med pa ni //
T02D2519:87b-1: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2519:87b-2: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02D2519:87b-3: bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yi //
T02D2519:87b-4: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02D2519:87b-5: 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2519:87b-6: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
T02D2519:87b-7: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod do //

T02D2519:87b-10: bdag gis sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2519:87b-11: bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang /
T02D2519:87b-12: thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas /

T02D2519:87b-14: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang /
T02D2519:87b-15: sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2519:87b-16: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2519:87b-17: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang thams cad mkhyen

T02D2519:87b-19: pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
T02D2519:87b-20: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //

T02D2519:87b-27: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor

T02D2519:87b-29: // de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
T02D2519:87b-30: tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par

T02D2519:87b-32: // // 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2519:87b-33: kyis byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje
T02D2519:87b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02D2519:87b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
T02D2519:88a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo @88a * //
T02D2519:88a-2: 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2519:88a-3: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba
T02D2519:88a-4: bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs
T02D2519:88a-5: kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun

T02D2519:88a-13: sngom pa don du gnyer ba la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02D2519:88a-14: de nas slob ma'i lag tu rdo rje dris dri /
T02D2519:88a-15: me tog gis me tog sbyin zhing bdug pas kyang slob ma yang dag par bdugs la /
T02D2519:88a-16: mar me mas mar mas snang bar bya'o //
T02D2519:88a-17: de nas au dum b'a ra'am aa shvadtha'i so shing spos dang /
T02D2519:88a-18: me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pa la khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas pa dang /
T02D2519:88a-19: ku sha sar pa ma nyams pa la khro bo
T02D2519:88a-20: rdo rje rnon po bzlas la de la sbyin par
T02D2519:88a-21: bya'o // de nas khro bo rdo rje srung ba
T02D2519:88a-22: bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa
T02D2519:88a-23: bya'o // / de'i dpung pa g-yon par bdag nyid kyis bcing bar bya zhing /
T02D2519:88a-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis yang dag par bsrung ba dang /
T02D2519:88a-25: byams pa'i go cha bskon la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:88a-26: bzhin bzangs longs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2519:88a-27: la phyag byos shig / nang par dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2519:88a-29: de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su lha thams cad de bzhin du bar snang la bzhag ste /
T02D2519:88a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas spos chus byugs la me tog la sogs pas kyang mdzes par byas nas /
T02D2519:88a-35: dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so
T02D2519:88a-36: sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag
T02D2519:88a-37: nas h'um tr'a hr'i: aa a'a zhes bya ba rang
T02D2519:88a-38: gi sa bon 'di las byung ba'i thig gi 'od
T02D2519:88a-39: zer gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang rang

T02D2519:88b-1: ba dang ; 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te rang
T02D2519:88b-2: gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu legs par dgang
T02D2519:88b-3: ba dang ; bar bya zhing / aom aa n+yo
T02D2519:88b-4: n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spha ra spha
T02D2519:88b-5: ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: aa tyanta aa
T02D2519:88b-6: nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril
T02D2519:88b-7: ba dang ; bar bya zhing / bar bya'o //
T02D2519:88b-8: de nas srad bu de tsandan bzang po la sogs
T02D2519:88b-9: pas byugs pa'i gser gyi snod la sogs par bzhag
T02D2519:88b-10: ba dang ; bar bya zhing / bar bya'o //

T02D2519:88b-14: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bdag
T02D2519:88b-15: po rnams kyi sngags kyang brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar
T02D2519:88b-16: bya'o ; / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2519:88b-17: thams cad la mchod la phyag byas nas langs te
T02D2519:88b-18: yid kyis rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas /
T02D2519:88b-19: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas rdo rje'i grogs
T02D2519:88b-20: mchog h'um zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo'i rdo rje
T02D2519:88b-21: las kyi gzugs su dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D2519:88b-22: yang de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pa
T02D2519:88b-23: la mig g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su yi ge dza
T02D2519:88b-24: las zla ba dang nyi ma ser po snang ba
T02D2519:88b-25: bskyed la / dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag du srad bu de btang la /
T02D2519:88b-26: srad bu dang po g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2519:88b-27: gyis bzung la phyis ni ci bder bya zhing phyogs
T02D2519:88b-28: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsam mo //
T02D2519:88b-29: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la //
T02D2519:88b-30: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste //
T02D2519:88b-31: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
T02D2519:88b-32: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02D2519:88b-33: aom badzra s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba 'di dang /
T02D2519:88b-34: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de
T02D2519:88b-35: bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi don gyi phyir
T02D2519:88b-36: 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2519:88b-37: grva bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir gdod //
T02D2519:88b-38: rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan //
T02D2519:88b-39: srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste //
T02D2519:88b-40: dar dang phreng bas shin tu brgyan //
T02D2519:88b-41: zla ba phyed par rab gnas pa'i //
T02D2519:88b-42: khyams kyis yongs su bskor ba dang //
T02D2519:88b-43: dra ba dra phyed dag gis spras //
T02D2519:88b-44: sgo rnams dang ni rgyan cha can //
T02D2519:88b-45: rlung gis spyod pa sna tshogs mchog / ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2519:88b-46: khyams ni med par gyur pa'i sgo //
T02D2519:89a-2: dkyil 'khor kun gyi grva rnams dang //
T02D2519:89a-3: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D2519:89a-4: rdo rje rin chen brgyan par ni //
T02D2519:89a-5: dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre //
T02D2519:89a-6: shes rab can gyis de nang du //
T02D2519:89a-7: rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan te //
T02D2519:89a-8: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2519:89a-9: ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas //
T02D2519:89a-10: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02D2519:89a-11: dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D2519:89a-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre //
T02D2519:89a-13: srad bu bres pa tshon gyis dgang //
T02D2519:89a-14: lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor yin par blta'o //
T02D2519:89a-15: gal te bgegs zlog par byed 'dod par gyur na
T02D2519:89a-16: seng ldeng gi phur bu stod rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2519:89a-18: smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la snga
T02D2519:89a-19: ma bzhin du rdo rje phur bu'i sngags bzlas te
T02D2519:89a-20: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rdo rjes brdung bar bya'o
T02D2519:89a-21: // yang dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su sngar
T02D2519:89a-22: bstan pa'i phur bu dang 'dra ba'i phur bu gzhan
T02D2519:89a-23: dag la phur bu'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2519:89a-24: pas go rims 'di bzhin du bgegs thams cad la
T02D2519:89a-26: ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags pa'i srad bus bskor phyogs su /
T02D2519:89a-28: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i yang phyi rol du /
T02D2519:89a-29: de bzhin du 'khor yug chen por zlum por thig legs par gdab par bya'o //
T02D2519:89a-30: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la
T02D2519:89a-31: sogs pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas brgya byin
T02D2519:89a-32: gyi gzugs brnyan rang gi phyogs na gnas pa la
T02D2519:89a-33: ai las brgya byin ser po /
T02D2519:89a-34: me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la'ang de bzhin te /
T02D2519:89a-35: ram las me lha dmar po'o //
T02D2519:89a-36: aom ham las gshin rje nag po'o //
T02D2519:89a-37: kram las srin po nag po /
T02D2519:89a-38: bam las chu lha dkar po /
T02D2519:89a-39: yang las rlung lha dud ka / phat las lus ngan po ser po /
T02D2519:89a-40: sumbha las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug ste /
T02D2519:89a-41: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02D2519:89a-44: dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab bo //
T02D2519:89b-0: shin tu yun ring du bgegs med par byed 'dod nas sa @89b dgab par bya'o //
T02D2519:89b-1: de ltar na yang gal te bgegs byed na rdo
T02D2519:89b-2: rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la 'dod pa'i
T02D2519:89b-3: rgyal pos bkug nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2519:89b-4: pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2519:89b-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2519:89b-6: rkang pa g-yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te /
T02D2519:89b-7: h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa spel
T02D2519:89b-8: ba'i tshul gyis zlos shing g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas
T02D2519:89b-9: gnas na / de lta bus bgegs bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:89b-10: yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin sngon du bya ba'i rjes thogs la /
T02D2519:89b-11: aa las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas /
T02D2519:89b-12: rgyud las gsungs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par bsams la /
T02D2519:89b-13: rang gi snying gnas ham las 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yid kyis phyung ste /
T02D2519:89b-14: badzra ham bandha zhes yid la zlos shing /
T02D2519:89b-15: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du rlung gi mtshams su dris thig le bdun byas te /
T02D2519:89b-16: thig le re re zhing yang nang du chud par byas la /
T02D2519:89b-17: dbus ma dang thig le bdun dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2519:89b-18: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun
T02D2519:89b-19: po mdog nag po ri dags la zhon par bsams
T02D2519:89b-20: la / 'phags pa mi g-yo bas bkug nas zhags pas bcings par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2519:89b-21: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la /
T02D2519:89b-22: lhag ma rlung lha drug ni de'i 'khor du kun nas gnas pa yin no //
T02D2519:89b-23: de nas kham phor aa las ri rab tu bsams la /
T02D2519:89b-24: de'i steng du aa nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs la /
T02D2519:89b-25: dbus su yi ge h'um gi sa bon las byung
T02D2519:89b-26: ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa mtshams rnams su mdung
T02D2519:89b-28: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes zlos shing kham
T02D2519:89b-29: phor des ji skad bshad pa'i yi ge yam bdun
T02D2519:89b-31: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du
T02D2519:89b-32: yi ge aom las sngar bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D2519:89b-33: rnam par snang mdzad bsams la /
T02D2519:89b-34: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2519:89b-35: spyan sngar g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas ri rab bzung
T02D2519:89b-36: nas ral gri dang zhags pas rlung lha rnams la
T02D2519:89b-37: bsdigs pa mdzad par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2519:90a-0: de lta bus ni rlung lha thams cad bcing bar @90a * //
T02D2519:90a-2: de nas chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2519:90a-3: yi ge h'um las 'phags pa mi g-yo ba rlung
T02D2519:90a-4: dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bdag nyid bskyed
T02D2519:90a-6: ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas /
T02D2519:90a-7: yi ge kham las ral gri dang /
T02D2519:90a-8: ram las nang na me yod par bskyed cing /
T02D2519:90a-11: de lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
T02D2519:90a-12: lag pa g-yas pas ral gri dang /
T02D2519:90a-13: zhags pas drangs nas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste /
T02D2519:90a-14: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la /
T02D2519:90a-15: rkang pa g-yon pas spyi bo nas btsir nas /
T02D2519:90a-16: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'am tsanda ma h'a ro
T02D2519:90a-17: sha na spho ta ya h'um ta ga ham mam
T02D2519:90a-18: zhes zlos shing gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par
T02D2519:90a-19: bya ba'am / dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva
T02D2519:90a-20: la sogs pas gzugs brnyan la bskus la me yis
T02D2519:90a-21: bya ba'am / gdung bar bya'o // me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang //
T02D2519:90a-22: zhi bar 'gyur bar the som med /
T02D2519:90a-23: tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang //
T02D2519:90a-24: de'i mdo la myur du tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
T02D2519:90a-25: las 'di yang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D2519:90a-26: gyis gsang sngags 'di khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen
T02D2519:90a-27: pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las brtsam par bya'o
T02D2519:90a-28: // yang na aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags
T02D2519:90a-29: pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po
T02D2519:90a-30: zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa zhabs drug pa /
T02D2519:90a-31: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02D2519:90a-32: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa /
T02D2519:90a-33: lho phyogs su khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i gtos kun du gang bar mdzad pa bsams la /
T02D2519:90a-34: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2519:90a-35: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas tsham rngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2519:90a-36: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02D2519:90a-37: mdzub mo gnyis nang sbyar ba ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:90a-38: de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
T02D2519:90b-0: kham phor so @90b ma btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D2519:90b-2: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas gsang sngags bris la /
T02D2519:90b-3: yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D2519:90b-4: kham phor kha sbyar te de'i nang du bzhag la /
T02D2519:90b-5: mi'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams te /
T02D2519:90b-6: sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2519:90b-9: mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:90b-10: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la /
T02D2519:90b-11: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor
T02D2519:90b-12: bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2519:90b-13: nas de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2519:90b-16: bcing ba byas nas gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2519:90b-17: de nas me'i tsha ba zhi ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D2519:90b-18: me'i steng du yi ge bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor ;
T02D2519:90b-19: de'i steng du padma'i dbus na gnas pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2519:90b-20: de'i steng du yi ge bam de nyid las bcom
T02D2519:90b-21: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kun da
T02D2519:90b-22: ltar dkar ba steng na bzhugs te /
T02D2519:90b-23: mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho
T02D2519:90b-24: chen po bzhi las chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab
T02D2519:90b-25: pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun sar pas phyogs bcur
T02D2519:90b-26: 'gengs par 'gyur bar bsam par bya'o rdo rje spyan
T02D2519:90b-27: can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang kham
T02D2519:90b-28: phor gyi ri rab dang phur bus yung dag par
T02D2519:90b-29: bsrungs la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje 'jigs
T02D2519:90b-30: byed kyi spyan dag gis de rnams kyi nam mkha'
T02D2519:90b-31: bcing bar byas la rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje
T02D2519:90b-32: dral bar bya'o // yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs rnams bzlog par bya'o //
T02D2519:90b-33: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la /
T02D2519:90b-34: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i rdo rje bcug ste
T02D2519:90b-35: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu
T02D2519:90b-36: ga bkang la mnyam por byas nas thig skud tshon
T02D2519:90b-37: dkar po dri zhim par spangs pa gdab par bya'o
T02D2519:90b-38: // de ltar thig legs par btab nas hi zhes
T02D2519:90b-39: bya ba las mig g-yas pa dang g-yon par nyi
T02D2519:90b-40: ma dang zla ba bskyed la khro bo'i la bas
T02D2519:90b-41: kun du bltas la sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02D2519:91a-0: de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par @91a * //
T02D2519:91a-2: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2519:91a-3: zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon
T02D2519:91a-4: rtsi thams cad la lan bdun bzlas na rdo rje'i
T02D2519:91a-5: dbang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2519:91a-8: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis las ni /
T02D2519:91a-9: mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
T02D2519:91a-10: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02D2519:91a-11: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya'o //
T02D2519:91a-12: hi zhes bya ba dang rdo rje nyi ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya mthar spar bar bya'o //
T02D2519:91a-13: de la 'bar ba'i lta ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2519:91a-14: rab tu 'bar ba mig bsgul zhing //
T02D2519:91a-15: mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa ;
T02D2519:91a-16: / lta ba gzi can yin par bshad //
T02D2519:91a-18: d'i pti dri shta aam ku sha dza:zhes bya ba 'di yang mig tu dgod do //
T02D2519:91a-19: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos
T02D2519:91a-20: shing g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dbang ldan
T02D2519:91a-21: gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g-yas nas bskor bas tshon
T02D2519:91a-24: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2519:91a-31: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02D2519:91a-32: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
T02D2519:91a-33: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
T02D2519:91a-34: de bzhin gzhan dag ma rgad 'dra //
T02D2519:91a-35: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02D2519:91a-36: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02D2519:91a-37: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2519:91a-38: shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste //
T02D2519:91a-39: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa //
T02D2519:91a-40: nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste //
T02D2519:91a-41: byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan //
T02D2519:91a-42: dbus kyis yi cha nyid ni //
T02D2519:91a-43: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02D2519:91a-44: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02D2519:91a-45: rab mnyam gzhag pas bri bar bya'o //
T02D2519:91a-46: yang na snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas /
T02D2519:91a-47: gser ram dngul las byas pa'am /
T02D2519:91a-48: sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i //
T02D2519:91a-49: pha gu gru bzhir byas pa la //
T02D2519:91a-50: sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya /
T02D2519:91a-51: aom badzra dzva la aagni pra d'ipta a'a karsha ya
T02D2519:91a-52: sarba th'a ga ta ma h'a badzra sa ma ya
T02D2519:91a-53: h'um dza:sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni //
T02D2519:91a-54: 'bar bas bskor ba gzhag par bya //
T02D2519:91a-55: de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba //
T02D2519:91a-56: padmo rdo rje kun de bzhin //
T02D2519:91b-1: aom badzra satva badzri dzva la m'a la h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-2: aom ratna badzri dzva la m'a la h'um tr'am /
T02D2519:91b-3: aom dha rma badzri dzva la m'a la h'um tr'i:/
T02D2519:91b-4: aom karma badzri dzva la m'a la h'um a'a:rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2519:91b-5: sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du //
T02D2519:91b-6: mkhas pas cho ga bzhin bri ba //
T02D2519:91b-7: rdo rje h'um mdzad dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2519:91b-8: de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //
T02D2519:91b-9: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02D2519:91b-10: de nas 'di yi phyag rgya bshad //
T02D2519:91b-11: yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
T02D2519:91b-12: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02D2519:91b-13: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni //
T02D2519:91b-15: de yi dbus su sems dpa' che //
T02D2519:91b-16: phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni //
T02D2519:91b-17: autpala che sngo mtsher ba'i mdog / rdo rje h'um mdzad bsdus pa ni //
T02D2519:91b-18: khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02D2519:91b-19: g-yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa ste //
T02D2519:91b-21: g-yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni //
T02D2519:91b-22: dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya //
T02D2519:91b-23: g-yas pa'i zhabs kyis au ma yi //
T02D2519:91b-24: nu ma'i steng du gnon pa bri //
T02D2519:91b-26: h'um aom ni sumbha badzra bidyotta ma h'um phat:ces bya ba dang /
T02D2519:91b-27: aom badzra sh'ul zhes bya ba'i snying po gnyis ni lha chen po'i'o //
T02D2519:91b-28: aom kro dha badzra aagni dzv'a la ya tri sh'u
T02D2519:91b-29: lam bhinda badzra hri da yam badzre na h'um phat
T02D2519:91b-31: de yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02D2519:91b-32: rdo rje khro bo gzhag pa ni //
T02D2519:91b-33: khros pa mche ba 'byung ba ste //
T02D2519:91b-35: de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no //
T02D2519:91b-36: aom badzra satva kro dha h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-37: aom badzra kro dha a'a karsha ya h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-38: aom badzra karma kro dha r'a g'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-39: aom badzra tushti kro dha s'a dhu s'a dhu h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-40: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2519:91b-41: dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang //
T02D2519:91b-42: der ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba //
T02D2519:91b-43: rdo rje khro bos bskor ba bri //
T02D2519:91b-44: de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //
T02D2519:91b-45: tr'am aom badzra bi shuddhe kro dha ha ra ha ra h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-46: aom badzra s'u rya ma h'a dzva la ma la kro dha dzva la ya sarba na h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-47: aom badzra kro dha ke tu de hi h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-48: aom badzra a'atta sa ta kro dha ha ha ha ha h'um phat /
T02D2519:91b-49: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2519:92a-2: / rdo rje'i sde ni bri bar bya //
T02D2519:92a-3: khro bo bdag nyid chen pos bskor //
T02D2519:92a-4: de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do //
T02D2519:92a-5: hr'i:aom badzra dharma kro dha bi n'a sha ya bi sho dha ya h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-6: aom badzra t'ikshna kro dha tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-7: aom badzra ke tu kro dha pra be sha ya mandale sarba na h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-8: aom badzra kro dha bh'a sha ba da ba da h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-9: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2519:92a-10: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par yang //
T02D2519:92a-11: rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni //
T02D2519:92a-12: rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor //
T02D2519:92a-13: de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do //
T02D2519:92a-15: aom badzra ka pa tsa kro dha raksha h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-16: aom badzra ya ksha kro dha kh'a da kh'a da h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-17: aom badzra kro dha mushthi s'a dha ya sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi ni grva rnams su //
T02D2519:92a-19: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du //
T02D2519:92a-20: ji ltar go rims bzhin du ni //
T02D2519:92a-21: gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o //
T02D2519:92a-22: de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //
T02D2519:92a-23: aom badzra l'a sya r'a ga ye h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-24: aom badzra m'a le aa bhi shinytsa h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-25: aom badzra g'i te ga ta h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-26: aom badzra nri tye ba sham ku ru h'um phat /
T02D2519:92a-27: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02D2519:92a-28: dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol tu /
T02D2519:92a-29: de yi grva rnams nyid du ni //
T02D2519:92a-30: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhin rnams bzhag / de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //

T02D2519:97b-20: bsdams pa de ji lta ba bzhin du bcings so

T02D2519:98a-36: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi yin no //

T02D2519:98a-38: tshogs rdo rje bskyed la las kyi phyag rgya bcing
T02D2519:98a-39: bar bya'o // de ni 'di yin te /

T02D2519:98a-45: bsgying [*bsgyings] bcas bsor bas gnyis ga yis ;

T02D2519:98a-49: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //

T02D2519:98a-52: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02D2519:98a-53: zhes bya ba ni rin chen h'um mdzad dang /

T02D2519:98a-57: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //

T02D2519:98a-59: g-yas pa yi ni g-yon pa dbye //
T02D2519:98a-60: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi h'um mdzad dang /

T02D2519:98b-1: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //

T02D2519:98b-8: rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //

T02D2519:98b-15: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //

T02D2519:98b-17: mchod pa'i mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02D2519:98b-18: rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam ste mnan //
T02D2519:98b-19: sgo srung gi ni phyag rgya kun ;
T02D2519:98b-20: / las kyi phyag rgya gar las byung //
T02D2519:98b-21: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag
T02D2519:98b-22: rgya chen po ni ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su
T02D2519:98b-24: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2519:98b-27: las kyi khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po

T02D2519:98b-32: ni rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lha mo'i gzugs
T02D2519:98b-33: 'dzin ma yin // bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis //
T02D2519:98b-34: phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa //

T02D2519:98b-37: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig go //

T02D2519:98b-42: ni byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag

T02D2519:98b-44: rig pa de nyid de rnams kyi ljags la bkod
T02D2519:98b-45: pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o

T02D2519:99a-8: rtse gsum pa yi dbus ma rtse //
T02D2519:99a-9: rdo rje phyag rgyar bzung ba ste //
T02D2519:99a-10: rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste //
T02D2519:99a-11: rdo rje mthu zhes bya ba'o //

T02D2519:99a-13: rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs btags //
T02D2519:99a-14: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te ;

T02D2519:99a-16: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de //

T02D2519:99a-20: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2519:99a-21: phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba de //

T02D2519:99a-23: mdzub mo mtheb bstan bcas pa dang //

T02D2519:99a-25: rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o //
T02D2519:99a-26: rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so //
T02D2519:99a-27: rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa //
T02D2519:99a-28: lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te //
T02D2519:99a-29: khu tshur brkyang la lag ngar bskum //
T02D2519:99a-30: kha phyogs su ni bskor bar bya //
T02D2519:99a-31: rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //

T02D2519:99a-35: g-yas pa mdun du mdung ring 'dzin //
T02D2519:99a-36: lag pa brkyang pa'ang de bzhin te //
T02D2519:99a-38: rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa'o //

T02D2519:99a-40: bsgyings bcas mdzub mo khar mche ba //

T02D2519:99a-42: dbung pa bskum zhing bcar ba dang //
T02D2519:99a-44: bran gyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so //

T02D2519:99b-30: bran mo rnams kyi dam dam tshig go //

T02D2519:100b-11: ti mi li brdung ba'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2519:100b-12: phyi rol du gar dang rol mo bya ba dang /
T02D2519:100b-13: cod pan dang gdu bu dang /
T02D2519:100b-14: rna rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang /
T02D2519:100b-15: aom zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2519:100b-16: de bzhin du dar dpyangs par bya ba dang /
T02D2519:100b-17: me tog chun 'phyang gi rnam par brgyan pa dang /

T02D2519:100b-21: rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs
