T02D2519:102a-1: rdo rje bcing pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni ku
T02D2519:102a-2: be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-3: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang pa ni slar btang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-4: sngags ni aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2519:102a-5: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba byas la /
T02D2519:102a-6: srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol la /
T02D2519:102a-7: gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra ba bya /
T02D2519:102a-8: mthe bo gnyis rab tu gshibs te bzhag la /
T02D2519:102a-9: de gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad
T02D2519:102a-10: nas nang du g-yab pa ni dbang ldan spyan drangs
T02D2519:102a-11: pa'i phyag rgya'o // de nyid las snga ma ltar
T02D2519:102a-12: mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni dbang
T02D2519:102a-13: ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-14: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-15: sngags ni dzrum dzrum shi ba dzrum sv'a h'a /
T02D2519:102a-16: g-yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la /
T02D2519:102a-17: lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la /
T02D2519:102a-18: steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni /
T02D2519:102a-19: tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2519:102a-20: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-21: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-24: s'u rya gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2519:102a-25: tsandra ya na ksha tra aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2519:102a-26: rkang pa mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la /
T02D2519:102a-27: lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
T02D2519:102a-28: sor mo rnams mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar /
T02D2519:102a-29: mthe bo zlum por byas la /
T02D2519:102a-30: 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha la sogs pa mdzub
T02D2519:102a-31: mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha
T02D2519:102a-33: spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du
T02D2519:102a-34: mdzub mo bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
T02D2519:102a-35: // mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2519:102a-36: sngags ni aa dho pri thi bhya: sv'a h'a aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02D2519:102a-38: de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad
T02D2519:102b-0: la @102b 'thor 'thung phul ba bdag dang slob ma'i
T02D2519:102b-1: tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig
T02D2519:102b-2: / las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig
T02D2519:102b-3: / ces brjod la thams cad slar btang ngo //
T02D2519:102b-4: yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'byung ba'i
T02D2519:102b-5: tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar
T02D2519:102b-6: bya ste / lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D2519:102b-7: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02D2519:102b-8: dri za srin po ga don gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D2519:102b-9: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D2519:102b-10: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor dang bcas la //
T02D2519:102b-11: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
T02D2519:102b-12: thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
T02D2519:102b-13: gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir byon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02D2519:102b-14: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02D2519:102b-15: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02D2519:102b-16: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02D2519:102b-17: chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang //
T02D2519:102b-18: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang //
T02D2519:102b-19: mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu dogs dang //
T02D2519:102b-20: g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02D2519:102b-21: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02D2519:102b-22: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02D2519:102b-23: gtsug lag khang ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
T02D2519:102b-24: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02D2519:102b-25: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02D2519:102b-26: lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang //
T02D2519:102b-27: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig dang //
T02D2519:102b-28: dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po'am //
T02D2519:102b-29: seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang //
T02D2519:102b-30: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02D2519:102b-31: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
T02D2519:102b-32: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02D2519:102b-33: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
T02D2519:102b-34: phreng ba me tog dri dang byug pa rnams //
T02D2519:102b-35: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul bas //
T02D2519:102b-36: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
T02D2519:102b-37: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D2519:102b-38: de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02D2519:103a-1: phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2519:103a-2: shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas //
T02D2519:103a-3: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02D2519:103a-4: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag / chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste //
T02D2519:103a-5: dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
T02D2519:103a-6: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02D2519:103a-7: lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang //
T02D2519:103a-8: ri yi lha dang gnong sbyin tshogs rnams la //
T02D2519:103a-9: so so so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams //
T02D2519:103a-10: rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2519:103a-11: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su ;
T02D2519:103a-12: / rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
T02D2519:103a-13: nang mi dmag dang dpung dang thabs cig tu //
T02D2519:103a-14: me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas //
T02D2519:103a-15: 'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang //
T02D2519:103a-16: bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D2519:103a-17: de la 'di ni phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags so //
T02D2519:103a-18: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am a'a dya nutpan natva ta /
T02D2519:103a-19: de nas nye reg byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par bltas te /
T02D2519:103a-20: gnas pa'i las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus
T02D2519:103a-21: su dpal khams sum rnams bar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2519:103a-22: gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags zlos shing me tog
T02D2519:103a-24: sbyin sreg gi cho gas dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2519:103a-25: kyi sngags kyis pa'i mar las sbyin blugs brgya rtsa
T02D2519:103a-26: brgyad dbul lo // dpal rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2519:103a-27: sogs pa'i sngags kyis kyang khro bo rdo rje 'bebs
T02D2519:103a-28: pa'i mthar thugs pa'i bar yang sreg blugs bdun bdun
T02D2519:103a-29: brgyad dbul lo // dbul lo // de nas rnam
T02D2519:103a-30: par snang mdzad la sogs pa me thab las me
T02D2519:103a-31: tog gi spyan drangs te rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2519:103a-32: sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor du rang
T02D2519:103a-33: rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o ;
T02D2519:103a-34: / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la /
T02D2519:103a-35: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2519:103a-36: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2519:103a-37: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2519:103a-38: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2519:103a-39: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2519:103b-0: 'dir @103b zhugs pa la snod du gyur pa dang
T02D2519:103b-1: / ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo //
T02D2519:103b-3: sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te /
T02D2519:103b-4: de dag gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2519:103b-5: chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams
T02D2519:103b-7: / bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang /
T02D2519:103b-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la sogs pa dang /
T02D2519:103b-10: dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang /
T02D2519:103b-11: sngar spyad pa la sogs mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te /
T02D2519:103b-12: de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du
T02D2519:103b-13: bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad
T02D2519:103b-15: bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang /
T02D2519:103b-19: spyod pa la dga' ba rnams dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2519:103b-20: pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par
T02D2519:103b-21: rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du chud pas lha gzhan
T02D2519:103b-22: gyi rigs dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug gis /
T02D2519:103b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re
T02D2519:103b-24: ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad
T02D2519:103b-25: yang dag par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga'
T02D2519:103b-27: rangs par 'gyur ba der ni bslab pa'i tshig gis
T02D2519:103b-28: 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis
T02D2519:103b-29: te / de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2519:103b-30: lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams
T02D2519:103b-34: yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang /
T02D2519:103b-35: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du /
T02D2519:103b-36: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug tu rung ngo //
T02D2519:103b-37: bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
T02D2519:103b-39: shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis 'bad cing /
T02D2519:103b-40: nyon mongs pa dag kyang mchis te /
T02D2519:103b-41: de dag kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs ma thag tu /
T02D2519:103b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'grub par dka' ba ma lags na /
T02D2519:104a-0: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ce 'tshal zhes zhu bar @104a * //
T02D2519:104a-2: / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste de
T02D2519:104a-3: la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'i dge
T02D2519:104a-4: bsnyen nam / dge sbyong ngam dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su blangs la /
T02D2519:104a-5: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pas slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te ;
T02D2519:104a-6: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:104a-7: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2519:104a-8: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2519:104a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2519:104a-10: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2519:104a-11: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2519:104a-12: sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol //
T02D2519:104a-13: de nas slob ma la rdo rje srung ba yongs
T02D2519:104a-14: su bzlas pa'i ras sngon po'i stod g-yogs dang smad
T02D2519:104a-15: g-yogs bskon zhing / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2519:104a-16: pa'i sgo srung bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs bcings la
T02D2519:104a-17: g-yogs bskon zhing / / phyag bzhi byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2519:104a-18: yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas ;
T02D2519:104a-19: slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02D2519:104a-20: lag na me tog thogs pa nyid dang /
T02D2519:104a-22: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2519:104a-26: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02D2519:104a-27: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02D2519:104a-28: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2519:104a-29: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02D2519:104a-30: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
T02D2519:104a-31: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i //
T02D2519:104a-33: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog / gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02D2519:104a-34: gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du //
T02D2519:104a-35: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02D2519:104a-36: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02D2519:104a-37: skal pa chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2519:104a-38: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02D2519:104a-39: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2519:104a-40: sangs rgyas kun ni yid 'ong ba //
T02D2519:104a-41: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2519:104a-42: dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che //
T02D2519:104a-43: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02D2519:104a-44: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur //
T02D2519:104a-45: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2519:104a-46: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2519:104a-47: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni /
T02D2519:104b-0: byang chub @104b sems ni yongs 'dzin cing //
T02D2519:104b-1: dam tshig sngom dang gsang ba yi //
T02D2519:104b-3: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:104b-4: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa //
T02D2519:104b-5: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02D2519:104b-6: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam ;
T02D2519:104b-7: / des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02D2519:104b-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2519:104b-9: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D2519:104b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2519:104b-11: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D2519:104b-12: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2519:104b-13: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02D2519:104b-14: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D2519:104b-15: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
T02D2519:104b-16: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02D2519:104b-17: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02D2519:104b-18: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2519:104b-19: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02D2519:104b-20: rin chen rigs mchog chen po dang //
T02D2519:104b-21: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D2519:104b-22: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02D2519:104b-23: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D2519:104b-24: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D2519:104b-25: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bya //
T02D2519:104b-27: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02D2519:104b-28: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2519:104b-29: sngom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2519:104b-30: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2519:104b-31: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02D2519:104b-32: de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi 'di //
T02D2519:104b-33: phas pham par ni rab tu bshad //
T02D2519:104b-34: spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste //
T02D2519:104b-35: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do //
T02D2519:104b-36: nyid dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D2519:104b-37: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02D2519:104b-38: gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2519:104b-39: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02D2519:104b-40: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02D2519:104b-41: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02D2519:104b-42: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
T02D2519:104b-43: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02D2519:104b-44: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi ;
T02D2519:104b-45: / chang ni rnam par spang par bya //
T02D2519:104b-46: sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02D2519:104b-47: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02D2519:104b-48: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02D2519:104b-49: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D2519:104b-50: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02D2519:104b-51: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02D2519:105a-2: ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02D2519:105a-3: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02D2519:105a-4: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02D2519:105a-5: 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spangs //
T02D2519:105a-6: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02D2519:105a-7: lha dang lha min gsang ba la //
T02D2519:105a-8: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing ;
T02D2519:105a-9: / phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02D2519:105a-11: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D2519:105a-12: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02D2519:105a-13: des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste //
T02D2519:105a-14: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02D2519:105a-15: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02D2519:105a-16: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D2519:105a-17: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2519:105a-18: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02D2519:105a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas //
T02D2519:105a-20: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2519:105a-21: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2519:105a-22: gang zhig sngom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la /
T02D2519:105a-23: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
T02D2519:105a-24: slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2519:105a-25: dbang bskur bar yang mi bya zhing /
T02D2519:105a-26: 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug go //
T02D2519:105a-27: de nas aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02D2519:105a-28: byang chub sems ni bla med pas //
T02D2519:105a-29: dam pa dag ni bskyed nas su //
T02D2519:105a-30: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02D2519:105a-31: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02D2519:105a-32: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02D2519:105a-33: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2519:105a-34: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de //
T02D2519:105a-35: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhi ma par byas la /
T02D2519:105a-37: phyi rol lan gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02D2519:105a-38: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2519:105a-39: 'dis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya rang nyid
T02D2519:105a-40: kyis bcings la / slob ma rnams 'ching du gzhug go //
T02D2519:105a-41: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02D2519:105a-42: yid kyis khros pa dag ba bya zhing //
T02D2519:105a-43: rdo rje mthe bo dam pa ste //
T02D2519:105a-44: khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //
T02D2519:105a-45: de nas de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
T02D2519:105a-46: aom badzra sa ma ya pra be sha ya mi zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2519:105a-47: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya zhing /
T02D2519:105b-0: lho phyogs @105b nas zhags pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2519:105b-1: nub phyogs nas lcags sgrog gis bsdam par bya'o //
T02D2519:105b-2: byang phyogs nas rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab par bya'o //
T02D2519:105b-3: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin
T02D2519:105b-4: du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste
T02D2519:105b-5: / deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis //
T02D2519:105b-6: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2519:105b-7: pa thams cad 'grub pa yang thob na dngos grub
T02D2519:105b-8: gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02D2519:105b-9: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyod par bya yis /
T02D2519:105b-10: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams
T02D2519:105b-11: la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig
T02D2519:105b-13: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis khro bo ti
T02D2519:105b-14: r'inti ri'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang
T02D2519:105b-15: gyen du bstan pa bcings la /
T02D2519:105b-16: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2519:105b-17: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis
T02D2519:105b-18: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas
T02D2519:105b-19: par 'gyur ro // de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02D2519:105b-20: mna'i snying po 'di lan cig brjod pa'i chu rdo
T02D2519:105b-21: rje slob ma de nyid 'thung du bcug la 'di
T02D2519:105b-23: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2519:105b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2519:105b-25: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02D2519:105b-26: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2519:105b-27: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2519:105b-28: aom badzra au da ka sha /
T02D2519:105b-29: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:105b-30: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02D2519:105b-31: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02D2519:105b-32: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D2519:105b-33: mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas
T02D2519:105b-34: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02D2519:105b-35: de'i rjes la yi ge aa rdo rje 'od zer
T02D2519:105b-36: gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa rang gi snying gar
T02D2519:105b-37: bsam par bya'o // de nas slob ma'i snying ga dang dpral ba dang /
T02D2519:105b-38: lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2519:105b-39: 'khor la gnas pa'i h'um hr'am hr'i: aa 'di dag
T02D2519:105b-40: las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang /
T02D2519:105b-43: sna tshogs rdo rje go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2519:106a-0: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas @106a * //
T02D2519:106a-1: rang dang slob ma'i snying gar dbye bar byas nas
T02D2519:106a-2: rang gi snying ga las yi ge aa phyung nas
T02D2519:106a-3: / slob ma'i snying ga la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug ste /
T02D2519:106a-4: lus thams cad kun du gang bar gyur par bsams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2519:106a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs
T02D2519:106a-6: la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur
T02D2519:106a-7: cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob
T02D2519:106a-8: dpon gyis myur du khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag
T02D2519:106a-9: rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go
T02D2519:106a-10: // 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02D2519:106a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2519:106a-12: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di //
T02D2519:106a-13: de ring nyid du dbab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha zhes bcu'am /
T02D2519:106a-22: brgya bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2519:106a-23: sku mdog dkar po 'od zer dmar po kun du
T02D2519:106a-24: 'khrugs pas yongs su gang bar bsams na nges par
T02D2519:106a-26: yang gal te babs par ma gyur na de'i tshe
T02D2519:106a-27: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril
T02D2519:106a-28: bu dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02D2519:106a-29: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan nas de nyid la dbab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2519:106a-30: steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2519:106a-31: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi steng na khros pas yi
T02D2519:106a-32: ge h'um gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan par
T02D2519:106a-33: mdzad pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung
T02D2519:106a-34: gi dkyil 'khor yi ge h'um gis 'degs par gyur
T02D2519:106a-35: mdzad pa dang / la / de bzhin du mi
T02D2519:106a-36: bskyod pa la sogs pa shar phyogs la sogs par
T02D2519:106a-37: mdzad pa dang / la / bzhugs pas / h'um tr'am hr'i: aa /
T02D2519:106a-38: zhes bya ba'i rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od
T02D2519:106a-39: kyi 'od kyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad
T02D2519:106a-40: par bsam zhing h'um badzra a'a be sha aa zhes
T02D2519:106a-41: lan brgya zlos shing de dbab par bya'o //
T02D2519:106a-42: gal te sdig pa shin tu che bas babs par
T02D2519:106a-43: ma gyur na sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig
T02D2519:106a-46: yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me //
T02D2519:106a-47: ral par rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02D2519:106a-48: mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la //
T02D2519:106a-49: til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shis //
T02D2519:106a-50: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2519:106b-0: zhes @106b bya ba dang lag pa g-yas pa'i steng
T02D2519:106b-1: du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas
T02D2519:106b-2: la / h'um dbus su bsam pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-3: de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i
T02D2519:106b-4: 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2519:106b-5: lus la 'bar bas sdig pa rnams bsreg par gyur
T02D2519:106b-7: de nas yang rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya de
T02D2519:106b-8: bzhin du bcings la dbab pa byas na nges par
T02D2519:106b-10: de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur pa gang yin pa de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-11: babs nas skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par
T02D2519:106b-12: shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro
T02D2519:106b-13: // de nas babs par shes pa dang /
T02D2519:106b-14: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
T02D2519:106b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pas glu blangs la /
T02D2519:106b-16: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-17: gal te babs nas rdo rje sems dpas khro bo'i
T02D2519:106b-18: khu tshur bcings nas de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo
T02D2519:106b-19: rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i khu tshur bcing bar
T02D2519:106b-20: bya'o // de bzhin du gal te rdo rje bzhad
T02D2519:106b-21: pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur bcings nas de'i tshe rdo
T02D2519:106b-22: rje chos kyi khro bo'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya
T02D2519:106b-24: de lta bus ni byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:106b-25: de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la smros shig / rdo rje zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-26: de nas ni thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:106b-27: de nas pra t'i tstsha badzra ho:/
T02D2519:106b-28: zhes bya bas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-29: de nas gang du babs par gyur pa de nyid la 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:106b-30: de nas aom pra ti gri hna stvam hi m'am
T02D2519:106b-31: satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba
T02D2519:106b-32: de de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-34: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2519:106b-35: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02D2519:106b-36: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02D2519:106b-37: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D2519:106b-38: he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yongs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2519:106b-39: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02D2519:106b-40: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02D2519:107a-0: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob ma'i snying gar dbab pa'i @107a * //
T02D2519:107a-1: phyag rgya dgrol du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2519:107a-2: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang ngam phyi rol
T02D2519:107a-3: du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon par
T02D2519:107a-4: phyogs par bris la der slob ma bzhag ste /
T02D2519:107a-5: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2519:107a-6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas phyag rgya
T02D2519:107a-7: chen por byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur bar bya
T02D2519:107a-8: ba ni / mchod yon bstab nas /
T02D2519:107a-9: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2519:107a-10: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang /
T02D2519:107a-11: dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2519:107a-12: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par dga' bar bya zhing /
T02D2519:107a-13: dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D2519:107a-14: de nas ni phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2519:107a-17: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02D2519:107a-18: ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas yang me
T02D2519:107a-19: tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pa
T02D2519:107a-20: mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o
T02D2519:107a-21: // slob mas kyang thal mo bskor te /
T02D2519:107a-22: slob dpon la phyag byas la yon gyi mchog phul
T02D2519:107a-23: te me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang
T02D2519:107a-24: blang bar bya'o // slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba
T02D2519:107a-25: ni ji skad du bstan pa'i gnas su rdo rje
T02D2519:107a-26: h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bzhag la /
T02D2519:107a-27: de'i lus la dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bkod de /
T02D2519:107a-28: aom badzra aa dhri pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa
T02D2519:107a-29: mi dri dhro me bha ba dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D2519:107a-30: h'um phat ces bya ba 'dis yang rnam par rgyal
T02D2519:107a-31: ba'i bum pa la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o
T02D2519:107a-32: // de nas 'di nyid zlos shing rnam par rgyal
T02D2519:107a-33: ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu
T02D2519:107a-34: // blangs la / aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes
T02D2519:107a-35: bya ba zlos shing chu'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par
T02D2519:107a-36: // blangs la / bya'o // 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:107a-37: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2519:107a-38: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2519:107a-39: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02D2519:107a-40: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chus 'grub bo //
T02D2519:107a-41: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2519:107a-42: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02D2519:107a-43: skye bo 'dus pa'i nang gnas na //
T02D2519:107a-44: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
T02D2519:107b-0: de nas cho ga thams @107b cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2519:107b-1: slob ma la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2519:107b-2: tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba byin nas gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02D2519:107b-3: lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad la lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D2519:107b-4: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste /
T02D2519:107b-5: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa bcug nas
T02D2519:107b-6: dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2519:107b-7: thams cad dang / slob dpon gyi las thams cad bslab par bya'o //
T02D2519:107b-8: 'di tsam gyis ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2519:107b-9: yang na rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam
T02D2519:107b-10: yongs su dor bar dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed
T02D2519:107b-11: kyi tshad tsam gyi khru bzhi pa la 'jug pa'i
T02D2519:107b-13: sgo nub tu bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas
T02D2519:107b-14: bris pa de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa
T02D2519:107b-15: bris nas / de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2519:107b-16: pa 'bar ba legs par bris nas rtsa ba'i dkyil
T02D2519:107b-17: 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor de mchod la glang po
T02D2519:107b-18: che'i gdan la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dar gyis bkab
T02D2519:107b-19: bris nas / pa la / rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas la de'i dbus su bzhag la /
T02D2519:107b-20: dbang bskur bar 'os pa de yang de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas ;
T02D2519:107b-21: gdan gyi steng na g-yon brkyang pa'i gnas pas dbang
T02D2519:107b-22: phyug chen po'i steng du ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2519:107b-23: bzhag nas / glang po che'i steng du bla res bres pa dang /
T02D2519:107b-24: g-yas logs su rdo rje h'um mdzad bzlas pa'i dar dang me tog gi chun 'phyang dang /
T02D2519:107b-25: rin po che'i tog can gyi gdugs kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D2519:107b-26: g-yon logs su yi ge aom bzlas pa'i gos sna tshogs dang /
T02D2519:107b-27: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ba bzhag ste /
T02D2519:107b-28: mchod yon byin nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2519:107b-29: dung dang rnga bo che dang /
T02D2519:107b-31: zangs dung la sogs pa rol mo'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2519:107b-32: phyi rol du gar dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2519:107b-33: yon gyi mchog blangs nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2519:107b-34: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pas bstod la /
T02D2519:107b-35: dang por ni bum pa gang bas so //
T02D2519:108a-1: nas rdo rje lcags skyu la sogs pa'i sngags zlos shin de'i bum pas so //
T02D2519:108a-2: de'i rjes la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las
T02D2519:108a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la des dbang
T02D2519:108a-4: bskur zhing 'thung du yang bcug nas /
T02D2519:108a-5: bum pas yang dbang bskur ba ni chu'i dbang bskur ba nyid do'o /
T02D2519:108a-6: de la sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2519:108a-7: aom badzra aom ku sha ma h'a kro dha a'a
T02D2519:108a-8: karsha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um dza: badzra aa
T02D2519:108a-9: bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du /
T02D2519:108a-10: aom badzra dzva la aagni pr'a d'i pti a'a karsha
T02D2519:108a-11: ya sarba ta th'a ga tam ma h'a badzra sa
T02D2519:108a-12: ma ya h'um dza: badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya
T02D2519:108a-13: ba'i bar ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i dbang
T02D2519:108a-14: bskur ba ste / sbyor ba lhag ma ni sngar bshad pa nyid yin no //
T02D2519:108a-18: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02D2519:108a-19: ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la /
T02D2519:108a-21: chos dang dam tshig kyang byin nas me tog dang
T02D2519:108a-22: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de
T02D2519:108a-23: / rin po che'i mig thur ram /
T02D2519:108a-24: gser la sogs pa'i thur ma thogs la /
T02D2519:108a-25: mdun du 'dug nas tshig 'di skad du gsal bar brjod par bya ste //
T02D2519:108a-26: de ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2519:108a-27: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02D2519:108a-28: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D2519:108a-29: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2519:108a-31: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i: zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2519:108a-32: de nas me long blangs la chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02D2519:108a-33: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2519:108a-34: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2519:108a-35: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2519:108a-36: rgyu dang las la kun du 'byung //
T02D2519:108a-37: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02D2519:108a-38: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02D2519:108a-39: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D2519:108a-40: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02D2519:108a-41: de nas aa las byung ba'i chos kyi dril bu dkrol du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2519:108a-42: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2519:108a-43: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D2519:108a-44: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02D2519:108a-45: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02D2519:108a-46: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byos /
T02D2519:108b-1: gzhu byin la phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi dang /
T02D2519:108b-2: steng du gcig 'og tu gcig 'phen du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2519:108b-3: ho zhes bya ba ni mnga' sbyin pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2519:108b-4: yang me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:108b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02D2519:108b-6: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2519:108b-7: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02D2519:108b-8: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02D2519:108b-9: 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2519:108b-10: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
T02D2519:108b-11: po byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes
T02D2519:108b-12: par gyis shig / de la me long gi sngags
T02D2519:108b-13: ni aom badzra satva zhes bya'o //
T02D2519:108b-14: de nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chos kyi
T02D2519:108b-15: 'khor lo bzhag la lag pa g-yas su dung byin
T02D2519:108b-16: la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:108b-17: deng nas brtsams te sems ba skyed pa //
T02D2519:108b-18: tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2519:108b-19: di ring phan chad 'jig rten la /
T02D2519:108b-20: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2519:108b-21: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02D2519:108b-22: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02D2519:108b-23: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02D2519:108b-24: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02D2519:108b-25: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02D2519:108b-26: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02D2519:108b-27: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02D2519:108b-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02D2519:108b-29: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02D2519:108b-30: ces bya bas rdo rje 'khor lo dang rdo rje
T02D2519:108b-31: smra ba'i chos kyi yi ge dang bcas pa sbyin
T02D2519:108b-33: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02D2519:108b-34: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2519:108b-36: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2519:108b-37: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D2519:108b-38: padma dang nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes
T02D2519:108b-39: tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba yang
T02D2519:108b-40: sbyin par bya'o // de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas //
T02D2519:108b-41: kun du sangs rgyas bdag bsgom pa'o //
T02D2519:108b-42: rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang //
T02D2519:108b-43: de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan nyid //
T02D2519:108b-44: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
T02D2519:108b-45: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2519:109a-2: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D2519:109a-3: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02D2519:109a-4: siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sv'a: de la gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2519:109a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D2519:109a-6: g-yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2519:109a-7: g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2519:109a-8: de nas slob ma rnams dbugs dbyung ba byas la /
T02D2519:109a-9: thams cad la gsang ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2519:109a-10: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02D2519:109a-11: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02D2519:109a-12: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar ;
T02D2519:109a-13: / khyed kyis nam yang ma byed cig / mah'a sa ma ya ha na phat /
T02D2519:109a-14: de nas sngags byin la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2519:109a-15: cho ga 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2519:109a-16: khyod kyis gzhan phyag rgya mi mkhas pa gang la
T02D2519:109a-17: yang phyag rgya gcig tsam yang ston par ma byed
T02D2519:109a-18: cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2519:109a-19: 'di ltar sems can de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor ma
T02D2519:109a-20: mthong bar sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing ba la sbyor
T02D2519:109a-21: bar byed kyang / de rnams kyis dngos grub ji
T02D2519:109a-22: lta ba bzhin du thob par mi 'gyur ba dang
T02D2519:109a-23: de nas da som nyi za bar gyur pas yang
T02D2519:109a-24: ba ma spangs par myur ba nyid du dus byas
T02D2519:109a-25: nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par
T02D2519:109a-27: rgyu des khyod kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:109a-28: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad
T02D2519:109a-29: dang me tog la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2519:109a-30: thams cad la yang dag par mchod la thams cad
T02D2519:109a-31: la ci nus bar mchod do zhes de bzhin gshegs
T02D2519:109a-32: pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas bdug spos
T02D2519:109a-33: la sogs pas ci 'dod par mchod pa byed du
T02D2519:109a-34: bcug la / ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa
T02D2519:109a-35: rnams la 'byor ba ci yod pa'i bza' ba dang
T02D2519:109a-36: btung ba la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2519:109a-37: dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis tshim par byas nas /
T02D2519:109a-38: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2519:109a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2519:109a-40: de nas yang thams cad sul yang smra bar ma
T02D2519:109a-41: byed cig / ces bsgo la mna'i snying po brjod
T02D2519:109b-0: par bya'o// @109b de nas zhugs pa rnams slar btang nas /
T02D2519:109b-1: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2519:109b-2: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la
T02D2519:109b-3: phyag byas nas lha chen po chung ma dang bcas
T02D2519:109b-4: pa snga ma bzhin du blangs la mchod nas /
T02D2519:109b-5: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2519:109b-6: dge pa'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi don du bsngos la /
T02D2519:109b-7: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D2519:109b-8: phyag rgya bcings te badzra mu: zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2519:109b-9: phyag rgya gang dang gang nas byung ba'i gnas de
T02D2519:109b-10: dang de nyid nas dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2519:109b-11: de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa sarba mu
T02D2519:109b-12: dra mu bam zhes bya ba 'dis snying gnas byung
T02D2519:109b-13: ba rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi
T02D2519:109b-14: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas pas dbang bskur la
T02D2519:109b-15: / mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing bar byas nas de bzhin du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2519:109b-16: de la rdo rje rin chen 'dis rdo rje rin
T02D2519:109b-17: chen gyi phyag rgya mthe bong snyoms mdzub mo gnyis
T02D2519:109b-18: kyi rtse mor sbyar nas go cha'i mthar phreng ba
T02D2519:109b-19: bcing bar byas la badzra tu shya ho zhes bya
T02D2519:109b-20: ba 'di dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o
T02D2519:109b-21: // yang phyag byas la bdag gis cho ga ma
T02D2519:109b-22: tshang bar bgyis pa gang lags pa de thams cad
T02D2519:109b-23: bdag la bzod par mdzod cig / ces de bzhin
T02D2519:109b-24: gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas khro
T02D2519:109b-25: bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2519:109b-26: yi ge h'um bzhi zlos bzhin du dkyil 'khor la
T02D2519:109b-27: bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs su gsol ba'i
T02D2519:109b-28: phyir / yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2519:109b-29: aom kri tva ba sarba satva aartha siddhi y'a tha
T02D2519:109b-30: nu ga / gatstsha dha rma buddha bi shva yam
T02D2519:109b-31: / pu na r'a ga ma na ya du ma'i
T02D2519:109b-32: mtha' dang bcas pa'i h'um bzhi zlos shing khro bo
T02D2519:109b-33: ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o
T02D2519:109b-34: / // de lta bus ni thams cad gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2519:109b-35: ji lta ba bzhin du sbrul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs
T02D2519:109b-36: 'khor dang bcas pa ni yid kyi legs pa'i sbyor
T02D2519:109b-37: bas rang gi lus la bcug la yi ge brgya
T02D2519:109b-38: pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas nas rdo rje srung ba dang /
T02D2519:110a-1: tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2519:110a-2: de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am
T02D2519:110a-3: a'a dya nu tpanna tt'a ta ces zlos shing dkyil
T02D2519:110a-4: 'khor phyis la dman pa la sogs pa chu bor
T02D2519:110a-5: dor bar bya'o // de nas h'um bzhis phur bu
T02D2519:110a-6: bton la aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la ti
T02D2519:110a-7: shtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni
T02D2519:110a-8: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2519:110a-10: gzugs brnyan thams cad bkru bar bya zhing khung bu yang dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2519:110a-11: dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa las //
T02D2519:110a-12: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags de //
T02D2519:110a-13: kun dga' snying po drag po mchog /'jig rten kun
T02D2519:110a-14: mkhyen nyid gyur cig / dpal khams gsum rnam par
T02D2519:110a-15: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'phags pa de
T02D2519:110a-16: kho na nyid bsdus pa las btus pa /
T02D2519:110a-17: slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2519:110a-19: // /'di'i gzhung tshad ni shlo ka stong nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga yod do //
T02D2519:110a-20: rdo rje ye shes mngon 'dod pa'i //
T02D2519:110a-21: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02D2519:110a-22: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
